channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
I'm pretty new with SCAR. I have an error. [code]program New; {.include srl\srl.scar} var spike, slash, blunt, magic: Integer; x, y: Integer; begin repeat spike := BitmapFromString(17, 13, 'beNqNkksLgkAAhP0n0inIgyA' + 'UGEUvIRBB7CmWSBRdDCIIjE799D4YkB60tHyXXWZ2Zh+W9THieAm9' + '3lCMxlPf71vGIYtADI7jwi99EITA5q7rtTtd227UGCw0ETKKZrP1K' + 'kvToiaKZvNFBoPBBBc7hGHseR1QSSHj+XyDbLODJFkL9RRa+S6235' + 'er1RYIIhENKbqKX2epqgf6PD8AeoVip7Phki+Xe3m6Al5CgSAwWIr' + 'iWKNKJJqfstarJNDtH8vrZzAfRJaPFYLe5k/fsWQv'); slash := BitmapFromString(14, 9, 'beNpjYEADZkZG5eUNEMSAA+Tm' + 'lQGRlZlpcXENMkJWk56eD0elpXWVlU0Q8cLCKiACijDgBgqSokE+P' + 'kAEsQuPS7wdbdBE4BYhAxkpKTwesbW0BCKICJovkEUgLgciuH/z8y' + 'vgKDU1F9N8SDDCVaLIAQD/5z7q'); blunt := BitmapFromString(10, 11, 'beNplj80KgzAQhPdtBI9Cc/D' + 'WEgiEQMGDeBCK2L80FUF8fzo4uBZdvsNmZneWiLjLWSnNyRSFkmdZ' + 'FYJy9d5bq2D41jQkdp0SnCPp3g/Px/h+kekTAUQCi1Cfv4lAwS0RO' + 'c6AnfufjAbXZSlYvKKL6Nu6lrU0nC4WGavrhPkYlkNBx8e39w+AFG' + 'Iz'); magic := BitmapFromString(12, 6, 'beNpjYICDp2tkgejxatlzs6WA' + 'yMOM80Sn5N4mCSAJRBA1D1bKAtGNxTLHpkoCEVDkcJskEEFkISpvL' + '5UBKgCp6ZCEo9PdUshq4OLneqWAJFAcQuIHQMV4ZOFWgAAAsyE1lA' + '=='); if(FindBitmap(spike, x, y)) then begin WriteLn('[Spike Object Found… Clicking]') ClickMouse(900, 400, true) if(FindBitmap(slash, x, y)) then begin WriteLn('[Slash Object Found… Clicking]') ClickMouse(900, 515, true) if(FindBitmap(blunt, x, y)) then begin WriteLn('[Blunt Object Found… Clicking]') ClickMouse(900, 460, true) if(FindBitmap(magic, x, y)) then begin WriteLn('[Magic Object Found… Clicking]') ClickMouse(900, 570, true) until(false) end.[/code]
Line 44: [Error] (12687:1): Identifier expected in script
Help me fix error &/or neaten up my script.

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Gikon Gikon
item.description:
@Gikon wrote:

Thanks LOADs Nashi :] Learned somethin’

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[code]program New;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
var
spike, slash, blunt, magic: Integer;
x, y: Integer;
begin
spike := BitmapFromString(17, 13, ‘beNqNkksLgkAAhP0n0inIgyA’ +
‘UGEUvIRBB7CmWSBRdDCIIjE799D4YkB60tHyXXWZ2Zh+W9THieAm9’ +
‘3lCMxlPf71vGIYtADI7jwi99EITA5q7rtTtd227UGCw0ETKKZrP1K’ +
‘kvToiaKZvNFBoPBBBc7hGHseR1QSSHj+XyDbLODJFkL9RRa+S6235’ +
‘er1RYIIhENKbqKX2epqgf6PD8AeoVip7Phki+Xe3m6Al5CgSAwWIr’ +
‘iWKNKJJqfstarJNDtH8vrZzAfRJaPFYLe5k/fsWQv’);
slash := BitmapFromString(14, 9, ‘beNpjYEADZkZG5eUNEMSAA+Tm’ +
‘lQGRlZlpcXENMkJWk56eD0elpXWVlU0Q8cLCKiACijDgBgqSokE+P’ +
‘kAEsQuPS7wdbdBE4BYhAxkpKTwesbW0BCKICJovkEUgLgciuH/z8y’ +
‘vgKDU1F9N8SDDCVaLIAQD/5z7q’);
blunt := BitmapFromString(10, 11, ‘beNplj80KgzAQhPdtBI9Cc/D’ +
‘WEgiEQMGDeBCK2L80FUF8fzo4uBZdvsNmZneWiLjLWSnNyRSFkmdZ’ +
‘FYJy9d5bq2D41jQkdp0SnCPp3g/Px/h+kekTAUQCi1Cfv4lAwS0RO’ +
‘c6AnfufjAbXZSlYvKKL6Nu6lrU0nC4WGavrhPkYlkNBx8e39w+AFG’ +
‘Iz’);
magic := BitmapFromString(12, 6, ‘beNpjYICDp2tkgejxatlzs6WA’ +
‘yMOM80Sn5N4mCSAJRBA1D1bKAtGNxTLHpkoCEVDkcJskEEFkISpvL’ +
‘5UBKgCp6ZCEo9PdUshq4OLneqWAJFAcQuIHQMV4ZOFWgAAAsyE1lA’ +
‘==’);

repeat
if(FindBitmap(spike, x, y)) then
begin
WriteLn(’[Spike Object Found… Clicking]’); //Good idea to end your lines with a ;, however some keywords you dont
ClickMouse(900, 400, true); //like the statement before else and after then.
end;
if(FindBitmap(slash, x, y)) then
begin
WriteLn(’[Slash Object Found… Clicking]’);
ClickMouse(900, 515, true);
end;
if(FindBitmap(blunt, x, y)) then
begin
WriteLn(’[Blunt Object Found… Clicking]’);
ClickMouse(900, 460, true);
end;
if(FindBitmap(magic, x, y)) then
begin
WriteLn(’[Magic Object Found… Clicking]’);
ClickMouse(900, 570, true);
end; //You forgot the end’s for your begins
until(IsFKeyDown(10)); //A Good idea not to use just plain False
//So it can have a chance to free the bitmaps afterwards so you dont lose memory
//It will stop looping and end the script when you hit F10
FreeBitmap(spike);
FreeBitmap(blunt); //Free your bitmaps so you won’t have memory leaks!
FreeBitmap(slash);
FreeBitmap(magic);
end.[/code]

You didn’t have an end for your begin’s
That was the only problem,
However I also changed where you put the repeat because otherwise you’d have a massive memory leak reloading each bitmap
I also changed the False because, when your working with Bitmaps, you ALWAYS have to free them when your done, or when your redeclaring them.

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Gikon Gikon
item.description:
@Gikon wrote:

I’m pretty new with SCAR. I have an error.

[code]program New;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
var
spike, slash, blunt, magic: Integer;
x, y: Integer;
begin
repeat
spike := BitmapFromString(17, 13, ‘beNqNkksLgkAAhP0n0inIgyA’ +
‘UGEUvIRBB7CmWSBRdDCIIjE799D4YkB60tHyXXWZ2Zh+W9THieAm9’ +
‘3lCMxlPf71vGIYtADI7jwi99EITA5q7rtTtd227UGCw0ETKKZrP1K’ +
‘kvToiaKZvNFBoPBBBc7hGHseR1QSSHj+XyDbLODJFkL9RRa+S6235’ +
‘er1RYIIhENKbqKX2epqgf6PD8AeoVip7Phki+Xe3m6Al5CgSAwWIr’ +
‘iWKNKJJqfstarJNDtH8vrZzAfRJaPFYLe5k/fsWQv’);
slash := BitmapFromString(14, 9, ‘beNpjYEADZkZG5eUNEMSAA+Tm’ +
‘lQGRlZlpcXENMkJWk56eD0elpXWVlU0Q8cLCKiACijDgBgqSokE+P’ +
‘kAEsQuPS7wdbdBE4BYhAxkpKTwesbW0BCKICJovkEUgLgciuH/z8y’ +
‘vgKDU1F9N8SDDCVaLIAQD/5z7q’);
blunt := BitmapFromString(10, 11, ‘beNplj80KgzAQhPdtBI9Cc/D’ +
‘WEgiEQMGDeBCK2L80FUF8fzo4uBZdvsNmZneWiLjLWSnNyRSFkmdZ’ +
‘FYJy9d5bq2D41jQkdp0SnCPp3g/Px/h+kekTAUQCi1Cfv4lAwS0RO’ +
‘c6AnfufjAbXZSlYvKKL6Nu6lrU0nC4WGavrhPkYlkNBx8e39w+AFG’ +
‘Iz’);
magic := BitmapFromString(12, 6, ‘beNpjYICDp2tkgejxatlzs6WA’ +
‘yMOM80Sn5N4mCSAJRBA1D1bKAtGNxTLHpkoCEVDkcJskEEFkISpvL’ +
‘5UBKgCp6ZCEo9PdUshq4OLneqWAJFAcQuIHQMV4ZOFWgAAAsyE1lA’ +
‘==’);

if(FindBitmap(spike, x, y)) then
begin
WriteLn(’[Spike Object Found… Clicking]’)
ClickMouse(900, 400, true)
if(FindBitmap(slash, x, y)) then
begin
WriteLn(’[Slash Object Found… Clicking]’)
ClickMouse(900, 515, true)
if(FindBitmap(blunt, x, y)) then
begin
WriteLn(’[Blunt Object Found… Clicking]’)
ClickMouse(900, 460, true)
if(FindBitmap(magic, x, y)) then
begin
WriteLn(’[Magic Object Found… Clicking]’)
ClickMouse(900, 570, true)
until(false)
end.[/code]

Line 44: [Error] (12687:1): Identifier expected in script

Help me fix error &/or neaten up my script.

Read full topic
